        count - Count of objects to fetch.

      • getUserLikedMedia

        public void getUserLikedMedia(<any> callback)
        See the list of media liked by the authenticated user. Private media is returned as long as the authenticated user has permission to view that media. Liked media lists are only available for the currently authenticated user.
        Parameters:
        callback - Provides an array of IGMedia objects and IGPageInfo object.

      • getUserLikedMedia

        public void getUserLikedMedia(<any> callback,
                              int count,
                              java.lang.String maxId)
        See the list of media liked by the authenticated user. Private media is returned as long as the authenticated user has permission to view that media. Liked media lists are only available for the currently authenticated user.
        Parameters:
        count - Count of objects to fetch.
        maxId - The nextMaxId from the previously obtained IGPage object.
        callback - Provides an array of IGMedia objects and IGPageInfo object.

      • getUsersIFollow

        public void getUsersIFollow(<any> callback)
        Get the list of users this user follows.
        Parameters:
        callback - Arraylist

      • getRelationshipStatusOfUser

        public void getRelationshipStatusOfUser(<any> callback,
                                        java.lang.String userId)
        Get information about a relationship to another user. Relationships are expressed using the following terms in the response: -outgoing_status: Your relationship to the user. Can be 'follows', 'requested', 'none'. -incoming_status: A user's relationship to you. Can be 'followed_by', 'requested_by', 'blocked_by_you', 'none'.
        Parameters:
        callback - Arraylist

      • getUsersFollowedByUser

        public void getUsersFollowedByUser(<any> callback,
                                   java.lang.String userId)
        Get the list of users userId follows.
        Parameters:
        userId - Id of the User object.
        callback - Provides an array of User objects as IGUser and IGPageInfo object.

      • followUser

        public void followUser(<any> callback,
                       java.lang.String userId)
        Modify the relationship between the current user and the target user. Follow a user.

        REQUIREMENTS : InstagramKitLoginScopeRelationships during authentication.

        To request access to this endpoint, please complete this form - https://help.instagram.com/contact/185819881608116

        Parameters:
        userId - Id of the User object.
        callback - Provides the server response as IGRelationship.

      • unFollowUser

        public void unFollowUser(<any> callback,
                         java.lang.String userId)
        Modify the relationship between the current user and the target user. Unfollow a user.

        REQUIREMENTS : InstagramKitLoginScopeRelationships during authentication.

        To request access to this endpoint, please complete this form - https://help.instagram.com/contact/185819881608116

        Parameters:
        userId - Id of the User object.
        callback - Provides the server response as IGRelationship.

      • blockUser

        public void blockUser(<any> callback,
                      java.lang.String userId)

        REQUIREMENTS : InstagramKitLoginScopeRelationships during authentication.

        To request access to this endpoint, please complete this form - https://help.instagram.com/contact/185819881608116

        Parameters:
        userId - Id of the User object.
        callback - Provides the server response as IGRelationship.

      • getMedia

        public void getMedia(<any> callback,
                     java.lang.String mediaId)
        Get information about a Media object.
        Parameters:

        mediaId - Id of a IGMedia object.

      • getMediaByShortCode

        public void getMediaByShortCode(<any> callback,
                                java.lang.String shortCode)
        This endpoint returns the same response as GET /media/media-id. A media object's shortcode can be found in its shortlink URL. An example shortlink is http://instagram.com/p/tsxp1hhQTG/. Its corresponding shortcode is tsxp1hhQTG.
        Parameters:
        callback - Arraylist

      • getMediaAtLocation

        public void getMediaAtLocation(<any> callback,
                               IGLocation location)
        Search for media in a given area. The default time span is set to 5 days. Can return mix of image and video types.
        Parameters:
        location - Geographic Location coordinates.
        callback - Provides an array of IGMedia objects and IGPageInfo object.

      • getMediaAtLocation

        public void getMediaAtLocation(<any> callback,
                               IGLocation location,
                               int count,
                               java.lang.String maxId)
        Search for media in a given area. The default time span is set to 5 days. Can return mix of image and video types.
        Parameters:
        location - Geographic Location coordinates.
        count - Count of objects to fetch.
        maxId - The nextMaxId from the previously obtained IGPage object.
        callback - Provides an array of IGMedia objects and IGPageInfo object.

      • getMediaAtLocation

        public void getMediaAtLocation(<any> callback,
                               java.lang.Float distance,
                               IGLocation location)
        Search for media in a given area. The default time span is set to 5 days. Can return mix of image and video types.
        Parameters:
        location - Geographic Location coordinates.
        distance - Distance in metres to from location - max 5000 (5km), default is 1000 (1km) in other methods
        callback - Provides an array of IGMedia objects and IGPageInfo object.

      • getMediaAtLocation

        public void getMediaAtLocation(<any> callback,
                               java.lang.Float distance,
                               IGLocation location,
                               int count,
                               java.lang.String maxId)
        Search for media in a given area. The default time span is set to 5 days. Can return mix of image and video types.
        Parameters:
        location - Geographic Location coordinates.
        count - Count of objects to fetch.
        maxId - The nextMaxId from the previously obtained IGPage object.
        distance - Distance in metres to from location - max 5000 (5km), default is 1000 (1km) in other methods
        callback - Provides an array of IGMedia objects and IGPageInfo object.

      • getCommentsOnMedia

        public void getCommentsOnMedia(<any> callback,
                               java.lang.String mediaId)
        Get a list of recent comments on a media object.
        Parameters:
        callback - Provides an array of IGComment objects.
        mediaId - Id of the Media object.

      • postCommentOnMedia

        public void postCommentOnMedia(<any> callback,
                               java.lang.String commentText,
                               java.lang.String mediaId)
        Create a comment on a media object with the following rules: - The total length of the comment cannot exceed 300 characters. - The comment cannot contain more than 4 hashtags. - The comment cannot contain more than 1 URL. - The comment cannot consist of all capital letters.

        REQUIREMENTS : InstagramKitLoginScopeComments during authentication.

        To request access to this endpoint, please complete this form - https://help.instagram.com/contact/185819881608116

        Parameters:
        commentText - The comment text.
        mediaId - Id of the Media object.
        callback - Invoked on successfully creating comment.

      • removeComment

        public void removeComment(<any> callback,
                          java.lang.String commentId,
                          java.lang.String mediaId)
        Remove a comment either on the authenticated user's media object or authored by the authenticated user.

        REQUIREMENTS : InstagramKitLoginScopeComments during authentication.

        To request access to this endpoint, please complete this form - https://help.instagram.com/contact/185819881608116

        Parameters:
        commentId - Id of the Comment object.
        mediaId - Id of the Media object.
        callback - Invoked on successfully deleting comment.

      • getLikesOnMedia

        public void getLikesOnMedia(<any> callback,
                            java.lang.String mediaId)
        Get a list of users who have liked this media.
        Parameters:
        callback - Provides an array of IGLike(subset of user) objects.
        mediaId - Id of the Media object.

      • likeMedia

        public void likeMedia(<any> callback,
                      java.lang.String mediaId)
        Set a like on this media by the currently authenticated user. REQUIREMENTS : InstagramKitLoginScopeLikes during authentication.

        To request access to this endpoint, please complete this form - https://help.instagram.com/contact/185819881608116

        Parameters:
        callback - Invoked on successfully liking a Media.
        mediaId - Id of the Media object.

      • unlikeMedia

        public void unlikeMedia(<any> callback,
                        java.lang.String mediaId)
        Remove a like on this media by the currently authenticated user. REQUIREMENTS : InstagramKitLoginScopeLikes during authentication.

        To request access to this endpoint, please complete this form - https://help.instagram.com/contact/185819881608116

        Parameters:
        callback - Invoked on successfully un-liking a Media.
        mediaId - Id of the Media object.

        Parameters:
        callback - Provides a IGTag object.
        name - Name of a Tag object.

      • getMediaWithTagName

        public void getMediaWithTagName(<any> callback,
                                java.lang.String name)
        Get a list of recently tagged media.
        Parameters:
        name - A valid tag name without a leading #. (eg. snowy, nofilter)
        callback - Provides an array of IGMedia objects this user has added and IGPageInfo info.

                                      IGLocation location,
                                      int distanceInMeters)
        Search for a location by geographic coordinate.
        Parameters:
        callback - Provides an array of IGLocation objects.
        location - Geographic Location coordinates.
        distanceInMeters - Default is 1000, max distance is 5000.
